title: Euro Rallies Above $1.20 on Broad Dollar Weakness, Trump Remarks
description: The euro climbed above the 1.20 level against the dollar for the first time since June 2021 after President Donald Trump said he was not concerned with the US currency’s decline.
content: The euro climbed above the 1.20 level against the dollar for the first time since June 2021 after President Donald Trump said he was not concerned with the US currency’s decline.
